org.corfudb.universe.node.client

Class LocalCorfuClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.universe.node.client.LocalCorfuClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CorfuClient, Node

    public class LocalCorfuClient
extends Object
implements CorfuClient
    Provides Corfu client (utility class) used in the local machine (in current process) which is basically a wrapper of CorfuRuntime.
